ABOUTUS.contentTitle1: With the aim to take the lead in the advanced global EPC market, we provide various services for areas ranging from project development, engineering, procurement, construction, and commissioning to O&M.
ABOUTUS.contentDescription1: Samsung Engineering is a specialized EPC company that provides comprehensive solutions across all areas of the plant industry. With strong pride for our pioneering role in the history of the Korean plant industry in the past 40 years, we successfully performed numerous projects around the world and grew into a globally competitive engineering company.
ABOUTUS.contentDescription2: We continuously expand our business across the engineering industry including Oil and Gas processing, Refinery, Petrochemical, Industrial, Environmental, BIO, and Green Solution areas. Based on our extensive experience, accumulated technologies and talented resources, we provide various services from the feasibility studies to engineering, procurement, construction, commissioning and O&M.
ABOUTUS.contentDescription3: Successfully completing over 1,000 projects in various regions around the world, including the Middle East, Asia, Americas and Europe, with our unique services for the past half a century, we are committed to building a global reputation for our flwaless quality and improving customer value.
ABOUTUS.contentDescription4: We will continue to enhance the future value of our clients driven by change and innovation, practice sustainable business management which values the environment, and contribute to the prosperity of mankind.
